localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Hyperweb magically enhances the web as you browse in Safari, automatically blocking ads, dismissing popups and suggesting smart alternatives to the page you're on. Hyperweb runs 100% locally on device and suggested enhancements are ever growing.
nodes.title: Hyperweb - All-in-one iOS Safari extension
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Taking control of your privacy and keeping your email private is now as easy as generating a strong password. Create masked email addresses without ever leaving the sign-up page. Available to everyone with both https://1password-onboarding.fastmail.dev/signup1password/ and https://start.1password.com/sign-up/family?c=FASTMAIL&utm_medium=social&utm_source=producthunt&utm_campaign=maskedemail accounts.
nodes.title: Masked Emails in 1Password - Protect your online privacy with unique email addresses
nodes.author: Madeline Hanley

nodes.excerpt: Unlimited, private video calls, right in your browser. No extra apps. No tracking. Just free connections, powered by Brave.
nodes.title: Brave Talk - Unlimited, private video calls, right in your browser
nodes.author: NaveenKumar Namachivayam

nodes.excerpt: SafeBase is the interactive security portal to share your security posture, automate access to sensitive compliance information, and subscribe to vendor security program updates.
nodes.title: SafeBase - Share your security program, automatically
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Authentication always has been security or convenience, but why compromise? One account - a privacy-focused, secure, and convenient authentication system with built-in 2FA (MFA)

nodes.author: Fajar Siddiq

nodes.excerpt: Eliminate your siteâ€™s dependency on cookie banners through fine-grained data regulation and smart, local quarantine.
nodes.title: Transcend Consent Manager - Consent management, reinvented
nodes.author: Gillian Morris

nodes.excerpt: LeaksID adds dynamic hidden anti-leak marks on all your documents and converts them to PDF. View protected documents, share them, download and print. Find the leaker in case of illegal publication.
nodes.title: LeaksID - Enrich private docs with dynamic invisible anti-leak marks
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: For all you red team hackers out there. This discreet web server can be used for covert field-use, with features that enhance remote execution, stealth, forensics evasion, all while being able to quickly change your tooling on the fly.
nodes.title: O.MG Cable - Covert web server and wifi in a cable
nodes.author: Michael Silber

nodes.excerpt: With Jaadoo you can search and manage your mobile screenshots, magically. We are privacy first, so no data ever leaves your phone.
nodes.title: Jaadoo - Search and manage your mobile screenshots, magically
nodes.author: Nav Chatterji

nodes.excerpt: Antistalker notifies you when apps use the camera or microphone of your device. It goes beyond the privacy dots! It tells you for how long are used and how much data your apps send to the internet.
nodes.title: Antistalker by Malloc - Control who is recording or sending data from your phone
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: PhishDeck makes it easy to simulate advanced realtime phishing attacks to improve and measure your security awareness program. It features ready-to-use phishing simulation templates, reports and actionable insights all with simple, transparent pricing.
nodes.title: PhishDeck - Build better phishing defenses
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: â€¢ Mobile SDK that enables passwordless sign up/login with a tap on mobile and QR on desktop â€¢ Eliminates account takeover fraud by leveraging device-based biometrics â€¢ Can be used as a login method or as a second verification layer in high risk cases
nodes.title: Keyri - Turn your app into an ultrasecure authenticator

nodes.excerpt: It's crazy how much of your sensitive personal information is floating around the internet for anyone to findâ€¦ So we created a software that finds and removes this information, then scans DAILY to make sure your information stays off of the internet.
nodes.title: Removaly - Remove your personal information from the internet.

nodes.excerpt: Created by ex-Google execs, Neeva is the worldâ€™s first 100% ad-free and private subscription-based search engine that puts the user first. Neeva never shares or sells user data with anyone and is committed to showing high-quality results for every search.
nodes.title: Neeva - Ad-free, private search
nodes.author: Steven Sinofsky

nodes.excerpt: Identance is a new AI-based environment which allows companies to be sure of their users and onboard customers in >15 sec. Full range of verification services at affordable prices and worldwide coverage: Identance -will keep your business safe!
nodes.title: Identance - A tool to identify and verify your users
nodes.author: Vladyslav Brashchenko

nodes.excerpt: Kodex is the easiest way for companies to process, and respond to, information requests from governments and law enforcement all around the world. The most common requests include preservation holds & subpoenas for user data from agencies like the FBI.
nodes.title: Kodex - The easiest way to process data requests from governments
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Pay As You Go VPN provides a cost-effective solution to the waste of money problem in subscription-based payment models. Subscription model charges you the same amount of money even when you never use the service, while PAYG model only charges you for what you use.
nodes.title: Pay As You Go VPN (PaygVPN) - No Commitment. Credit based VPN. A cost-effective solution.
nodes.author: Mark Packer

nodes.excerpt: The internet can be a dark place, but you can rest easy with our military-grade end-to-end encryption. You'll be able to control your digital identity and have one less thing to worry about!
nodes.title: Cove Identity - Your safe space online - Ultra-secure privacy suite to manage your digital identity.
nodes.author: Porush Puri

nodes.excerpt: Super Agent fills out cookie consent forms based on your preferences, saving you time and letting you take control of your privacy.
nodes.title: Super Agent - Automatic cookie consent
nodes.author: Humberto

nodes.title: Trustpage - Building trust with customers just got easier

nodes.excerpt: LazyWeb is a conversational search engine with a simple chat interface free from ads and tracking. It's like messaging a smart friend that answers questions and sends you useful links. It's the first search engine where you control how results display.

nodes.excerpt: End-to-end encrypted email service ProtonMail has refreshed its design, updating with a cleaner look and a more customizable user interface â€” including the ability to pick from a bunch of themes (dark and contrasting versions are both in the mix).
nodes.title: ProtonMail 2.0 - Secure email that respects your privacy, with slick new look
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Redact is a free desktop app that lets you easily mass delete or programmatically delete content from social networks and instant messengers. Ever want to delete all your political tweets from 2017-2021? Redact makes that easy. Reclaim your privacy.
nodes.title: Redact.dev - Mass delete your content on social networks and messengers

nodes.excerpt: WARP free VPN for desktop encrypts all the traffic from your machine and sends it directly to Cloudflareâ€™s edge, ensuring that no one in between is snooping your data â€” including your ISP. Keeps your traffic secure, private and fast.

nodes.title: Skotty - Smarter online communication for professionals

nodes.excerpt: Share your images, not your secrets. Black Highlighter makes it easy to hide text you donâ€™t want to share in images youâ€™re going to share anyway. Hide peopleâ€™s names, e-mail addresses, and more with just a quick scribble.
nodes.title: Black Highlighter - Share your images not your secrets

nodes.excerpt: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.
nodes.title: Insight Browser - Supercharge search & browsing on iOS with no-code extensions
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: CyberCat VPN is Your Unlimited, Encrypted, Fast & Ad Free VPN for iPhone & iPad. Welcome to a new world of internets with a super fast and secure no log VPN. Bring down the virtual walls and pounce on all the content you can handle.
nodes.title: CyberCat VPN - A privacy focused, Ad blocking, Unlimited VPN for iOS. Meow
nodes.author: James Stanley

nodes.excerpt: Planetary is a social media app built upon the idea of protocols not platforms. Users and creators own their identities and social relationships. Privacy is respected and creators supported. Abuse and harassment is handled through community governance.
nodes.title: Planetary - Decentralized social media by and for the people.
nodes.author: rabble

nodes.excerpt: bilgge is a free service which makes you feel as if you were storing data in a real safe house. instead of saying "it uses end-to-end encryption" then asking you 8+ characters password to protect your data, it gives you power to encrypt your data by yourself in your browser.
nodes.title: bilgge. - a privacy-paranoid free service for your notes and secrets

nodes.excerpt: Do you support decentralization and an open internet that isnâ€™t dominated by a handful of Big Tech companies? Now you can be part of the revolution by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine.
nodes.title: Presearch - A Better Search Engine - Support decentralized search by becoming a node operator.
nodes.author: Alex Carrabre

nodes.excerpt: Ethical Product Alternatives is a simple, open-source browser extension built to help you discover new, more ethical tools focused on privacy every time you open a new tab.
nodes.title: Ethical Product Alternatives - Ethical alternative products every time you open a new tab
nodes.author: Ria Blagburn

nodes.excerpt: Simple - Essential analytics in a single page dashboard. No Code - Find how users interact with buttons, videos & forms by selecting them from your page. Custom Events & Funnels. Privacy friendly - No personal data collected. No Cookies. GRDP & CCPA compliant.
nodes.title: GingerTag - Simple, No-Code, Privacy Friendly Analytics
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.
nodes.title: Persona - Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0
nodes.author: Dylan Field

nodes.excerpt: Firefox Relay makes it easy to create aliases, randomly generated email addresses that forward to your real inbox. Use it to protect your online accounts - and your identity - from hackers.
nodes.title: Firefox Relay - Hide your real email address to help protect your identity.
nodes.author: qztn

nodes.excerpt: Canary Mail brings a simple design, powerful feature-set, and easy-to-use email encryption. Now on Android.
nodes.title: Canary Mail - Privacy-friendly email app for macOS, iOS & Android
nodes.author: Sohel Sanghani

nodes.excerpt: Browse the web like it should be â€“ free of nags to accept cookies or privacy invasive tracking. It's tiny, fast, free, open, secure and without any access to your data.
nodes.title: Hush for Safari - Block nags to accept cookies and privacyâ€¨ invasive tracking
nodes.author: Joel Arvidsson

nodes.excerpt: An easy to use, privacy-focused alternative to the big analytics platforms that keeps everyone anonymous and puts you in charge. Created and hosted in the EU, powered by renewable energy.
nodes.title: Microanalytics.io - Privacy-focussed alternative to the big analytics platforms.
nodes.author: Andrew Jackson

nodes.excerpt: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
nodes.title: Drata - Put SOC 2 Compliance on Autopilot
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: No More Facebook lists privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products. Replace FB completely or use it less by trying these alternatives. Suggest a privacy-friendly alternative to help people depend less on one company.
nodes.title: No More Facebook - Privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products â¤ï¸
nodes.author: Kai Oelfke

nodes.excerpt: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
nodes.title: Elza Browser - Fast, private, and minimal web browser.
nodes.author: Nitin Sudhakar

nodes.excerpt: Privacy policies and data request forms SHOULD be easy to find, but many companies hide them deep in their UI. Privacy hunt is a simple, free, crowd-sourced repository to reduce that to 1 click! ğŸ˜ Find a company, click on the link, and reclaim YOUR data. ğŸ™Œ
nodes.title: Privacy Hunt - We hunt data request forms, so you can reclaim YOUR data.
nodes.author: Robert Thelen

nodes.excerpt: Ethi helps you find out how Facebook tracks you across the internet, across the world, collects hundreds of interests about you and tracks your social life. Then we help you delete what you no longer want them to keep!
nodes.title: Ethi - Find out what Facebook knows about you, and delete it.
nodes.author: Michael Jelly

nodes.excerpt: PrivacyGrader.com provides an online assessment within 24 hours that measures how well a businessâ€™s website upholds consumer data protection laws, assesses privacy functionality, and highlights potential gaps and issues with the site.
nodes.title: PrivacyGrader - Analyzing a website's privacy & compliance in under 24 hours
nodes.author: Alexandra Velasquez

nodes.excerpt: dLinks lets you build a decentralized profile on Web 3.0 in seconds. Built using Handshake and Sia: Handshake names are decentralized domains that no one can block access to. Skynet offers decentralized backend hosting that cannot be taken down.
nodes.title: dLinks - An easy to use, no-code site builder for Web 3.0
nodes.author: Neeraj Thakur
